seo.title: gonzaddv - My personal website
seo.description:
Hi! I'm Gonza, the founder of ddv.software. My innate curiosity has led me on a fascinating journey to seek answers to the questions I ponder daily, aiming to gain a deeper understanding of how we, as humans, function. While some of these questions might not have clear answers, it's the pursuit of understanding that drives and excites me. 
 This quest brought me to the world of programming, where I blend ingenuity, creativity, and enthusiasm to solve problems. Eager to elevate this passion, I established ddv.software, a company dedicated to creating technological solutions for the everyday needs of individuals and businesses.
